  • Classes in org.ardenus.input.controller used by org.ardenus.input 
    Class and Description
    Controller
    A controller that is used for input.
    ControllerButton
    A button on a controller.
    GamepadDirection
    Represents a direction that is being pressed on a controller either with it's left analog stick or (supposedly) it's directional pad.
  • Classes in org.ardenus.input.controller used by org.ardenus.input.button

    Class and Description
    Controller
    A controller that is used for input.
    ControllerButton
    A button on a controller.
    ControllerType
    Used to indicate what type of controller a controller is.
    GameCubeController.AdapterData
    Contains the USB adapter information that will be used when updating the controller.

    Represents a direction that is being pressed on a controller either with it's left analog stick or (supposedly) it's directional pad.
